data.text: What Supplements Should I Use for Bike Tours to Help with Recovery?
Morning everyone, What supplements do people use for bike tours to help with recovery?

We used to carry recovery drinks, hydration, and gels. This was expensive, plus extra weight. So now we fill one of our water bottles with Juice, to drink while travelling, plus once and hour some flap jack or fruit. Then for the end of the day we have peanut butter or chocolate spread on bread or tortillas with a hot chocolate. We do between 40 and 70 km a day, do not have any problems. If you are planning longer days at speed you may need more. Cycling in Jura, France, UK and Europe.
data.author: Martin Clarke
